rubric.label: Naming
rubric.description: All variables, private methods and classes have meaningful names. No hungarian notation is used.

rubric.label: Structure and Layout
rubric.description: Code is organised logically and uses whitespace to ease readability.

rubric.label: Code Design
rubric.description: Well thought out code that is easily followed and is maintainable

rubric.label: Object-Oriented Practices
rubric.description: The course content to be applied to solve certain challenges present in the assignment
